attributes.about_this_biz_history: Fresh, local and rustic fare prepared for you in a comfortable and charming seaside eatery. Arms Reach Bistro offers a true west coast dining experience that is dedicated our friends, neighbours and guests of Deep Cove BC. A short 20 minute drive from downtown Vancouver finds this quaint community with an abundance of outdoor activities, flip flop friendly eateries and local flavour. See you soon!

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
We are family run small cafe specializing in mouth watering french classics with an casual contemprary style. 

The traditional brunch items would include braised short rib with poached egg and red wine sauce  or a tolouse special cassoulet with swiss cheese baked white beans, confit pork , sausage and other goodies.

our pastries are made from scratch , and if you are just feeling something light then we also have a bread n meat menu  and ask the server for daily specials.

Our restaurant makes everything from scratch daily, from pizza doughs and appetizers and salads, right down to the sauces on each plate. Our pizzas are a must try! We also have delicious bowls and appetizers!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: We wanted to open a great coffee shop in North Vancouver providing better food options than the average cafe.  Wanted to offer simple, fresh made to order foods to enjoy with a great cup of coffee.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Cafe Orso is a coffee house in Deep Cove, North Vancouver working to make the best coffee experience in the area.  We pair our fantastic coffee with fresh made to order food and source as many products from British Columbia as possible.

Feeling the buzz as you enter our bustling café, we offer a wide variety of breakfast options made with free-range eggs, sandwiches made on our tasty vegan potato bread, homemade soups, hearty salads, and so much more. We also offer gluten-free options. Top off your meal with a specialty beverage, with espresso from JJ Bean and coffee from Canterbury, and enjoy our one-of-a-kind doughnuts. Eat in or take it to go!

about_this_biz_business_recommendation.description: Co-owned and supplied by InGrain Pastificio. Sample some of our wonderfully crafted pastas at Arms Reach Bistro.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Surprised by the use of Western Canadian wheat by traditional Italian pasta manufactures we set out to make a fresher, local pasta.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: InGrain Pastificio was conceived by the owners of Arms Reach Bistro. The Pastificio manufactures a better quality pasta made from local ancient grains and offers a small bistro styled dining room. The InGrain Pasta can be found in local retail stores around the lower mainland.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: At Ingrain Pastificio we specialize in making quality dry pasta or "pasta secca"using the traditional method of slow extrusion through bronze dies.  Our pasta is then dried slowly in order to give the best possible flavour and texture.  Our alternative grain pastas are made with locally milled flours made from organic ancient grains.  We also have salads, sandwiches, pastries and breads all made in house daily.  Our small menu is changed seasonally in order to showcase our variety of artisanal pastas.

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Catering and Delivery

We specialize in catering many different events and ceremonies. Get in touch with our team to learn how we can make your event one to remember.

Please note, orders must be paid for in store. For your convenience, we accept cash, Visa, Mastercard, American Express and Interac.

When placing a catering or delivery order for your event, please be sure to provide the following information:
Date of the event
Time and location
Number of people
Your thoughts and ideas about the menu
Your budget

Cakes

Whether you are hosting a formal wedding or a birthday party, you'll make the event special with one of our custom cakes.

The best way contact us to place an order or receive a personalized quote is by email.

For the most efficient response, please provide the following information in your request:
Date of the event
Time and location
Number of people
Your thoughts and ideas about the cake design
Your budget

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Whether you wanna book our food trailer to your private events or have our Bánh Mì and Cà Phê catering to the site. Reach out to us, we'd love to cook for you!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Find and follow our Food Truck on our Website and on Instagram. We are proud to offer Catering for your next party, event, or corporate luncheon as well. We look forward to hearing from you!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Marcel had previously worked as a manager of a local fish plant.  When he took over the business in 1993, the boat "Barkley Surge" was included in the purchase.  Three engines later and a slow overhaul of the boat, the "Surge" is still an integral part of Marcel's continued success.  In order to do his part for the environment, Marcel's boat and transport vehicles are fuelled by recycled canola oil utilized from the kitchen at The Crab Shop.  Marcel fishes daily during the crab season allowing him to bring in the freshest catch in town to your plate!
attributes.about_this_biz_history: The Crab Shop has been a fixture on the North Shore since the 1960′s.  It originated on the mudflats at 2817 Dollarton Highway.  It was purchased in 1961 by Martin Dobay under the name of North Vancouver Fish Supply.  In 1982 the name was changed to "The Crab Shack".  In 1988 the shop relocated north of the highway at 2464 Dollarton Highway.  In 1993, the current owner Marcel Gregori took over from Dobay and remained at the same location until 2007 when the store moved within walking distance of its current location to #121-2455 Dollarton Highway in the newly constructed Dollarton Landing Plaza.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We specialize in Live Crabs, Cooked Crabs, Crab Meat, Fresh Wild Seafood as well as hot treats including our famous Fish 'n' Chips, Fish Tacos, Salmon Burgers, Clam Chowder to name a few....PLEASE NOTE: Our kitchen closes 15 minutes prior to close so don't be disappointed, we do take calls for pick up if you're on the road and on your way to us.......

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Lovers of cooking and baking. After 10 years of working in the food and beverage industry, we wanted to start over our own thing with one of the smallest carts here, YVR. We are happy when pork butt is being braised, mushrooms are being chopped, and butter is melting. Our dream only gets bigger with food lovers like you
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Cooking, Eating and Laughing is what makes us happy and happier. Ohh, can't miss drinking. We wanted to share what makes us happy with people like you.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We are offering simple and bold Korean inspired dishes including Rice Bowls with a choice of BBQ Pork, Chili Chicken, Beef Meatball and Vegan Tofu.

Welcome to our Italian & Grill Restaurant, where we offer a unique blend of classic Italian cuisine and juicy grilled meat. Our Italian menu is a testament to the diversity of Italian cuisine, featuring classic dishes from different regions of Italy and offering you a journey through the culinary landscape of Italy. But we also take our grilling seriously, our juicy steaks, tender chicken, and succulent seafood are grilled to perfection, with a delicious char and a smoky flavor that is sure to tantalize your taste buds. Executive Chef Satinder Randhawa

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Negar Nassiri and Morteza Ghobadi owners
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Founded in 2005 at Hastings and Richards Street in downtown Vancouver, Waves has been blazing the trail for with superbly fresh brewed coffee, a commitment to local craftsmanship and community, and incomparable service.
In 2008, we were recognized by the Brand Coaches as the Hottest Brand in Canada. We have also been recognized as the Best of Brands by over 1,500 coffee retailers.
Today there are 38 Waves across British Columbia and Alberta and with more to come you'll be sure to ride the Waves with us sometime soon!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Your Place to Connect
To wave is a simple gesture which invites connection.
When was the last time you genuinely connected with something or someone? Chances are it was far too long ago. We set out to create a place where friends, family, and strangers could feel good coming together as a community. Waves Coffee invites you to connect with each other, a good cup of coffee, or something you've long forgotten. This is the sentiment and the origin behind our name.
At Waves, we take two things very seriously: coffee and chocolate. This is why we source and use only the best coffee beans available; 100% Specialty Grade beans purchased directly from small lot farmers. We blend our top quality coffee beans together with real Belgian chocolate (powder, be gone.) The result is a flavorful mocha that is second-to-none.
Waves is committed to providing a fresh and wide variety of sandwiches, wraps, soups and seasonal pastries. Pair our locally-sourced coffee and chocolate beverages with our fresh food menu for an elevated coffee-shop culinary experience.
Top it off with our unique set of offerings like a robust selection of rooibos drinks, free meeting rooms and consistently gracious team members. It's these elements and more that make Waves an intimate and locally-conscious answer to the replicated atmosphere of multinational coffee giants.
Coffee, Tea, Frappe, Iced Drinks, Sandwiches, and Pastries.

The owners of Deep Cove and Colosseum Pizza, wined and dined throughout the Mediterranean searching for the quintessential European pizza experience; they had many and developed the following Italian Classic Pizzas

Gourmands rejoice! Finally pizzas made with simple, pure ingredients like ffresh hand-picked herbs combined with the finest Italian cured meats, exquisite cheeses and only the freshest vegetables. We make the dough daily for both restaurants so you can always count on a perfect crust.

We know you will love our pizza as much as we do!

attributes.about_this_biz_history: With nine taps rotating, hearty house made soup, tacos, made to order burritos, burgers, truffle fries, hand-dipped beer battered fish and chips, the Micro Eatery promises honest handcrafted food.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Located on Deep Cove's main strip, the Micro Eatery is a modest licensed restaurant that offers fresh, wholesome, healthy food and drink for sit-in or on-the-go.  Open for lunch and dinner everyday. With nine taps rotating.

Port Moody's newest play café and drop-in daycare!

A chic café overlooking a clean and modern playground for kids ages 0 - 6. Serving an excellent cup of coffee and great food. Little Beans Play Café is the perfect place for playdates!

Our drop-in daycare operates Monday - Friday 9am to 5pm.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Located at the heart of Lynn Valley, North Vancouver, Mr. Sushi is the first Sushi restaurant in town. With over 20 years of experience serving local residents, Mr. Sushi has become the neighbourhood favourite Sushi restaurant. 

Our mission is to provide the best Sushi in town using the freshest ingredients. Always with a smile, we strive to satisfy your appetite for Sushi with delicious foods and speedy services.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Located at the heart of Lynn Valley, North Vancouver, Mr. Sushi is the first Sushi restaurant in town. With over 20 years of experience serving local residents, Mr. Sushi has become the neighbourhood favourite Sushi restaurant. 

Our mission is to provide the best Sushi in town using the freshest ingredients. Always with a smile, we strive to satisfy your appetite for Sushi with delicious foods and speedy services.

We pride ourselves on using beans from Agro Roasters, our organic specialty coffee roaster supplier based in East Van. We work with local suppliers to source the freshest, highest quality ingredients and offerings. Quality and freshness is of upmost importance and we are up early in the mornings baking up a storm.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Brian Chin, born in Kingston, Jamaica, enjoyed an early life in Port Royal, relishing sun-soaked beaches, simple joys by the harbor, and the legacy of Fort Charles. Relocating to Canada at six for better education, his family's culinary ties led to their ownership of Hibiscus Foods, known for delightful Jamaican patties. Despite studying marine biology, Brian took over the business in 2013, rebranding as Morgan's Harbour in 2019. He preserves his uncle's legacy, infusing it with innovation and a deep passion for crafting exquisite Jamaican patties.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Morgan's Harbour offers an authentic Jamaican Patty experience in BC, inspired by Port Royal near Jamaica's capital. Committed to crafting exceptional Patties, we reject shortcuts for true flavour. Our artisanal approach revives the past's rich patty flavours lost to mass production. Using traditional methods and quality ingredients, we deliver a classic indulgence. With new ownership in 2013 came innovation, refining ingredients, removing preservatives, and introducing a remarkable Vegan patty. Every bite of a Morgan's Harbour patty blends the best of then and now, inviting you to savour a genuine Jamaican moment.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Free deliveries for Jamaican Meals and frozen Jamaican Patties on Wednesdays. Curbside pickups available from Wednesdays to Fridays between 11:00 am and 4:00 pm.

Indulge in the vibrant flavours of the Caribbean with our mouthwatering Jamaican Meals and Patties! At Morgans Harbour, we bring the spirit of Jamaica straight to your plate. From our rich and savoury Jerk Chicken to the delightful spice of our Curry Chicken, and the hearty goodness of our Oxtail, our Jamaican Meals capture the essence of the island's culinary traditions. And don't miss out on our irresistible Jamaican Patties, available in a variety of flavours that dance with authentic Caribbean spices. Whether you're craving a hearty meal or a quick snack, our Jamaican cuisine is a journey for your taste buds that you won't want to miss. Come savour the Caribbean with Morgans Harbour today!
Soft-serve ice cream & signature shakes top the menu at this classic burger & fries fast-food chain.

For Papa John's Pizza in North Vancouver, BC, the secret to success is much like the secret to making a better pizza - the more you put into it, the more you get out of it. Whether it's our signature sauce, toppings, our original fresh dough, or even the box itself, we invest in our ingredients to ensure that we always give you the finest quality pizza. For you, it's not just Better Ingredients. Better Pizza. It's a family gathering, memorable birthday, work celebration or simply a great meal. It's our goal to make sure you always have the best ingredients for every occasion. Call us at (604) 988-8323 for delivery or stop by Lynn Valley Rd for carryout to order your favorite, pizza, breadsticks, or wings today!

attributes.about_this_biz_history: We have been providing live fire onsite catering  for Weddings, Corporate events, Movie production, Festivals, And large private parties for over 10 years. We pride ourselves on using  local high quality ingriediants when ever possible.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Real Southern live fore BBQ catering. We specializing in Pulled pork, Ribs, Chicken, Brisket, Whole hog and Prime Rib. We bring our Ole Hickory Pits Smoker to your event and cook on site. Corporate Events, Weddings,  Impress your clients by partnering with Porkmafia to make your occasion a success and one that will not be forgotten.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: In 1958, two brothers borrowed $600 from their mom to open a pizza place in Wichita, Kansas. They named it Pizza Hut because their sign only had room for eight letters. How profound! Soon, the restaurant grew. Why? The pizza was awesome. The service felt like home. And the customers were treated like family. And we've been delivering that same food and service ever since. For the Love of Pizza Since 1958. From day one, the Carney brothers could look their customers in the eye and promise them the finest pizza in town -- because they knew the farmers who grew the ingredients, and they knew those farmers cared about quality. Since then, our farmers have grown right alongside us, and the ingredients we use are still our highest priority. No one loves pizza more than Pizza Hut. That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Get 50% off some of your favourite regular priced medium pizzas: Hawaiian, Pepperoni Lover's, Canadian, and Margherita pizzas. Online Only. Limited Time.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Our story began in an RV, our little traveling home in which we, and our two wonderful cat-kids, moved all the way from QC to BC, which was a sublime experience! Through this journey, our fascination for adventure in nature, accompanied with our passion about veganism, made us realize how our life-changing transition to veganism is strikingly similar to this adventurous tour that brought us to this beautiful, exhilarating and colorful piece of earth that we now call home. That was our epiphany, the moment that ‘Rvegan Tour’ was born of our vegan tour.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: At Rvegan Tour we offer 100% plant-based, vegan, pre-packaged, ready to eat foods that add vareity to your meals. Our foods are versatile, easy, convenient, inherently gluten free, and healthy. Great for environment and definitly better for animals too.

additional_locations.unformatted: Greater Vancouver Regional District, BC, Canada

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: By 1996, The Butler Did It Catering Co. had built a healthy customer base and had vastly outgrown their little starter kitchen. Darryl began the long and exhaustive search for a new location that would eventually include a café. Out of the blue, a brochure arrived in the mail offering an ideal commercial kitchen with a 16-seat café for lease in Kitsilano. It was perfect. They moved into the premises in May, renovated, and opened for business in June of 1997. Over the 7 years in that location they nurtured a growing loyal catering clientele, and developed a great rapport with their neighbourhood by offering a consistent variety of healthy, delicious food.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: The Butler Did It Catering Co. was founded in 1994 by three young, enthusiastic entrepreneurs: Darryl Ray, Jamie, and Erin Avantini. Each partner brought knowledge from the different aspects of the Food & Beverage industry. Darryl and Erin worked together at The Brockhouse Restaurant on the West Side of Vancouver perfecting their front of house service, while Jamie was a Chef at the Westin Bayshore. It was during this time - while they were beginning to do some freelance off-premise catering - that they came across a faltering catering/food product business for sale. Soon enough with their profits, support of friends and family, and a minimally equipped 450 sq. foot kitchen, they were off and cooking!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
The Lynn Canyon Café is located in the spectacular Lynn Canyon Park.

Whether you're enjoying a world class hike or just visiting the incredible free suspension bridge, the Lynn Canyon Cafe has everything you need. The menu has a wonderful selection including tasty soups; fresh made panini's and a delicious BBQ pulled pork sandwich, as well as some classic comforts like Poutine and Burgers.
For beverages we are serving Starbucks coffees, Tazo teas and local beer by Bridge Brewery.

Looking for a venue for your special event? Our 2nd floor mezzanine is available to rent.

A beautiful space nestled in Lynn Canyon Park. The Mezzanine is an impressive space with a soaring ceiling and large outdoor private deck. Hiking and outdoor nature activities are literally at your doorstep. Great for meetings, retreats, corporate events, birthday and family celebrations.
